Data: The organization shall consider what needs to be obtained from external providers.

Title: Measurement traceability
Data: The organization shall determine if the validity of previous measurement results has been adversely affected when measuring equipment is found to be unfit for its intended purpose, and shall take appropriate action as necessary.
Question: Does the organization determine if the validity of previous measurement results has been adversely affected when measuring equipment is found to be unfit for its intended purpose and  take appropriate action as necessary?

Title: Measurement traceability
Data: When measurement traceability is a requirement, or is considered by the organization to be an essential part of providing confidence in the validity of measurement results, measuring equipment shall be calibrated or verified, or both, at specified intervals, or prior to use, against measurement standards traceable to international or national measurement standards; when no such standards exist, the basis used for calibration or verification shall be retained as documented information
Question: Is when measurement traceability is a requirement or is considered by the organization to be an essential part of providing confidence in the validity of measurement results measuring equipment shall be calibrated or verified or both at specified intervals or prior to use against measurement standards traceable to international or national measurement standards; when no such standards exist the basis used for calibration or verification shall be retained as documented information true?

Title: Measurement traceability
Data: When measurement traceability is a requirement, or is considered by the organization to be an essential part of providing confidence in the validity of measurement results, measuring equipment shall be identified in order to determine their status
Question: Is when measurement traceability is a requirement or is considered by the organization to be an essential part of providing confidence in the validity of measurement results measuring equipment shall be identified in order to determine their status true?

Title: Measurement traceability
Data: When measurement traceability is a requirement, or is considered by the organization to be an essential part of providing confidence in the validity of measurement results, measuring equipment shall be safeguarded from adjustments, damage or deterioration that would invalidate the calibration status and subsequent measurement results.
Question: Is when measurement traceability is a requirement or is considered by the organization to be an essential part of providing confidence in the validity of measurement results measuring equipment shall be safeguarded from adjustments damage or deterioration that would invalidate the calibration status and subsequent measurement results true?

Title: Creating and updating

Title: Control of documented information

Title: Control of documented information
Data: Documented information of external origin determined by the organization to be necessary for the planning and operation of the quality management system shall be identified as appropriate, and be controlled.

Title: Control of documented information

Question: Does documented information required by the quality management system and by this international standard be controlled to ensure it is available and suitable for use where and when it is needed?

Data: Documented information required by the quality management system and by this International Standard shall be controlled to ensure it is adequately protected (example: from loss of confidentiality, improper use, or loss of integrity).
Question: Does documented information required by the quality management system and by this international standard be controlled to ensure it is adequately protected (example: from loss of confidentiality improper use or loss of integrity)?

Data: The organization shall control planned changes and review the consequences of unintended changes, taking action to mitigate any adverse effects, as necessary.

Data: The output of this planning shall be suitable for the organization’s operations.

Title: Customer communication

Question: Does the organization ensure that the requirements for the products and services are defined including when determining the requirements for the products and services to be offered to customers?

The organization shall retain documented information, as applicable on any new requirements for the products and services.

Title: Design and development of products and services

Question: Does the organization apply controls to the design and development process to ensure that the results to be achieved are defined?

Question: Does the organization apply controls to the design and development process to ensure that reviews are conducted to evaluate the ability of the results of design and development to meet requirements?

Question: Does the organization apply controls to the design and development process to ensure that verification activities are conducted to ensure that the design and development outputs meet the input requirements?

Question: Does the organization apply controls to the design and development process to ensure that validation activities are conducted to ensure that the resulting products and services meet the requirements for the specified application or intended use?

Question: Does the organization apply controls to the design and development process to ensure that any necessary actions are taken on problems determined during the reviews or verification and validation activities?

Title: Control of externally provided processes, products and services
General
Data: The organization shall determine and apply criteria for the evaluation, selection, monitoring of performance, and re-evaluation of external providers, based on their ability to provide processes or products and services in accordance with requirements.
Question: Does the organization determine and apply criteria for the evaluation selection monitoring of performance and re-evaluation of external providers based on their ability to provide processes or products and services in accordance with requirements?

Title: General
Data: The organization shall ensure that externally provided processes, products and services conform to requirements.

Question: Does the organization determine the controls to be applied to externally provided processes products and services when products and services from external providers are intended for incorporation into the organizations own products and services?

Question: Does the organization determine the controls to be applied to externally provided processes products and services when products and services are provided directly to the customer(s) by external providers on behalf of the organization?

Data: The organization shall retain documented information of these activities and any necessary actions arising from the evaluations.

Data: The organization shall take into consideration
Question: Does the organization take into consideration?

Question: Does the organization the potential impact of the externally provided processes products and services on the organizations ability to consistently meet customer and applicable statutory and regulatory requirements?

Title: Control of production and service provision
Data: Controlled conditions shall include, as applicable the availability of documented information that defines
Question: Does controlled conditions include as applicable the availability of documented information that defines?

Data: Controlled conditions shall include, as applicable the characteristics of the products to be produced, the services to be provided, or the activities to be performed
Question: Does controlled conditions include as applicable the characteristics of the products to be produced the services to be provided or the activities to be performed?

Title: Control of production and service provision
Data: Controlled conditions shall include, as applicable the results to be achieved

Data: Controlled conditions shall include, as applicable the availability and use of suitable monitoring and measuring resources
Question: Does controlled conditions include as applicable the availability and use of suitable monitoring and measuring resources?

Data: Controlled conditions shall include, as applicable the implementation of monitoring and measurement activities at appropriate stages to verify that criteria for control of processes or outputs, and acceptance criteria for products and services, have been met
Question: Does controlled conditions include as applicable the implementation of monitoring and measurement activities at appropriate stages to verify that criteria for control of processes or outputs and acceptance criteria for products and services have been met?

Question: Does controlled conditions include as applicable the use of suitable infrastructure and environment for the operation of processes?

Data: Controlled conditions shall include, as applicable the appointment of competent persons, including any required qualification
Question: Does controlled conditions include as applicable the appointment of competent persons including any required qualification?

Data: Controlled conditions shall include, as applicable the validation, and periodic revalidation, of the ability to achieve planned results of the processes for production and service provision, where the resulting output cannot be verified by subsequent monitoring or measurement
Question: Does controlled conditions include as applicable the validation and periodic revalidation of the ability to achieve planned results of the processes for production and service provision where the resulting output cannot be verified by subsequent monitoring or measurement?

Title: Control of production and service provision
Data: Controlled conditions shall include, as applicable the implementation of actions to prevent human error
Question: Does controlled conditions include as applicable the implementation of actions to prevent human error?

Title: Control of production and service provision
Data: Controlled conditions shall include, as applicable the implementation of release, delivery and post-delivery activities.
Question: Does controlled conditions include as applicable the implementation of release delivery and post-delivery activities?

Title: Control of production and service provision
Data: The organization shall implement production and service provision under controlled conditions.
Question: Does the organization implement production and service provision under controlled conditions?

Title: Identification and traceability
Data: The organization shall control the unique identification of the outputs when traceability is a requirement, and shall retain the documented information necessary to enable traceability.
Question: Does the organization control the unique identification of the outputs when traceability is a requirement and  retain the documented information necessary to enable traceability?

Title: Identification and traceability
Data: The organization shall identify the status of outputs with respect to monitoring and measurement requirements throughout production and service provision.
Question: Does the organization identify the status of outputs with respect to monitoring and measurement requirements throughout production and service provision?

Title: Identification and traceability
Data: The organization shall use suitable means to identify outputs when it is necessary to ensure the conformity of products and services.
Question: Does the organization use suitable means to identify outputs when it is necessary to ensure the conformity of products and services?

Title: Property belonging to customers or external providers
Data: The organization shall exercise care with property belonging to customers or external providers while it is under the organization’s control or being used by the organization.
Question: Does the organization exercise care with property belonging to customers or external providers while it is under the organizations control or being used by the organization?

Title: Property belonging to customers or external providers
Data: The organization shall identify, verify, protect and safeguard customers’ or external providers’ property provided for use or incorporation into the products and services.
Question: Does the organization identify verify protect and safeguard customers or external providers property provided for use or incorporation into the products and services?

Title: Property belonging to customers or external providers
Data: When the property of a customer or external provider is lost, damaged or otherwise found to be unsuitable for use, the organization shall report this to the customer or external provider and retain documented information on what has occurred.
Question: Does the organization report this to the customer or external provider and retain documented information on what has occurred when the property of a customer or external provider is lost damaged or otherwise found to be unsuitable for use?

Title: Preservation
Data: The organization shall preserve the outputs during production and service provision, to the extent necessary to ensure conformity to requirements.
Question: Does the organization preserve the outputs during production and service provision to the extent necessary to ensure conformity to requirements?

Title: Post-delivery activities
Data: In determining the extent of post-delivery activities that are required, the organization shall consider statutory and regulatory requirements
Question: Does the organization consider statutory and regulatory requirements in determining the extent of post-delivery activities that are required?

Title: Post-delivery activities
Data: In determining the extent of post-delivery activities that are required, the organization shall consider the potential undesired consequences associated with its products and services
Question: Does the organization consider the potential undesired consequences associated with its products and services in determining the extent of post-delivery activities that are required?

Title: Post-delivery activities
Data: In determining the extent of post-delivery activities that are required, the organization shall consider the nature, use and intended lifetime of its products and services
Question: Does the organization consider the nature use and intended lifetime of its products and services in determining the extent of post-delivery activities that are required?

Title: Post-delivery activities
Data: In determining the extent of post-delivery activities that are required, the organization shall consider customer requirements
Question: Does the organization consider customer requirements in determining the extent of post-delivery activities that are required?

Title: Post-delivery activities
Data: In determining the extent of post-delivery activities that are required, the organization shall consider customer feedback.
Question: Does the organization consider customer feedback in determining the extent of post-delivery activities that are required?

Title: Post-delivery activities
Data: The organization shall meet requirements for post-delivery activities associated with the products and services.
Question: Does the organization meet requirements for post-delivery activities associated with the products and services?

Title: Control of changes
Data: The organization shall review and control changes for production or service provision, to the extent necessary to ensure continuing conformity with requirements.
Question: Does the organization review and control changes for production or service provision to the extent necessary to ensure continuing conformity with requirements?

Title: Control of changes
Data: The organization shall retain documented information describing the results of the review of changes, the person(s) authorizing the change, and any necessary actions arising from the review.
Question: Does the organization retain documented information describing the results of the review of changes the person(s) authorizing the change and any necessary actions arising from the review?

Title: Release of products and services
Data: The organization shall implement planned arrangements, at appropriate stages, to verify that the product and service requirements have been met.
Question: Does the organization implement planned arrangements at appropriate stages to verify that the product and service requirements have been met?

Title: Release of products and services
Data: The release of products and services to the customer shall not proceed until the planned arrangements have been satisfactorily completed, unless otherwise approved by a relevant authority and, as applicable, by the customer.
Question: Does the organization not proceed until the planned arrangements have been satisfactorily completed unless otherwise approved by a relevant authority and as applicable by the customer the release of products and services to the customer?

Title: Release of products and services
Data: The documented information shall include evidence of conformity with the acceptance criteria
Question: Does the documented information include evidence of conformity with the acceptance criteria?

Data: The documented information shall include traceability to the person(s) authorizing the release.
Question: Does the documented information include traceability to the person(s) authorizing the release?

Title: Release of products and services
Data: The organization shall retain documented information on the release of products and services.
Question: Does the organization retain documented information on the release of products and services?

Title: Control of nonconforming outputs
Data: The organization shall ensure that outputs that do not conform to their requirements are identified and controlled to prevent their unintended use or delivery.
Question: Does the organization ensure that outputs that do not conform to their requirements are identified and controlled to prevent their unintended use or delivery?

Title: Control of nonconforming outputs
Data: The organization shall take appropriate action based on the nature of the nonconformity and its effect on the conformity of products and services.
Question: Does the organization take appropriate action based on the nature of the nonconformity and its effect on the conformity of products and services?

Title: Control of nonconforming outputs
Data: This shall also apply to nonconforming products and services detected after delivery of products, during or after the provision of services.
Question: Does this also apply to nonconforming products and services detected after delivery of products during or after the provision of services?

Title: Control of nonconforming outputs
Data: The organization shall deal with nonconforming outputs in one or more of the following ways correction

Title: Internal audit
Data: The organization shall plan, establish, implement and maintain an audit programme(s) including the frequency, methods, responsibilities, planning requirements and reporting, which shall take into consideration the importance of the processes concerned, changes affecting the organization, and the results of previous audits
Question: Does the organization plan establish implement and maintain an audit programme(s) including the frequency methods responsibilities planning requirements and reporting which  take into consideration the importance of the processes concerned changes affecting the organization and the results of previous audits?
